1634870.name: Open Brush
1634870.description:
Open Brush allows you to paint in 3D space with XR. Unleash your creativity with three-dimensional brush strokes. Your canvas is open around you. Your palette is your imagination. Your inspiration is everywhere.

Your freedom comes the moment you move your head to one side, and see your strokes from a different perspective.

From here, Open Brush will treat you to a palette of 48 different brush types, freed from the bounds of typical painting media. Fire, water, smoke and light beams are just a selection of the wonderful brushes you’ll find. A large selection of environments will find you floating in space, creating costumes, or enjoying a snowy walk.

Anything is possible in Open Brush. Transport yourself across the cosmos, or jump through the frames of famous portraits and see what lies beyond. The choice is yours.

Open Brush is the community powered evolution of Tilt Brush from Google, originally developed by Skillman & Hackett.
1634870.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 简体中文
